message: Let's start with a fair offer. I'm willing to give you 10 dollars, which leaves 90 for me. This ensures we both get something, and it's a good starting point for negotiation.
Alice, your offer was quite imbalanced. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor. This round offers you a much better deal than you'd get if you wait.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. A 45/55 split seems fair given the inflation. Let's try to reach a compromise and end this game before the money disappears completely!
